sentences.en: Bridget , conflicted and deeply wounded, is unyielding and slow to understand.
sentences.cn: 布蕾吉特很矛盾 、 很受伤;她桀骜不逊、拙于理解.

sentences.en: But I will make you as unyielding and hardened as they are.
sentences.cn: 8看哪,我使你的脸硬过他们的脸,使你的额硬过他们的额.

sentences.en: He became more and more unyielding.
He is always unyielding in his opinions.
He sat on the edge of an unyielding armchair, a cup of tea in his hand.
sentences.cn: 他坐在一张坚固的扶手椅的椅边上，手里端着一杯茶。

sentences.en: He stood unyielding and unafraid against the enemy.
His unyielding attitude on this subject was that since he had done it, so could everyone.
sentences.cn: 在这件事上他态度很坚决：既然他做到了，别人也能做到。

sentences.en: On the other side, the men stood pat and were unyielding.
sentences.cn: 在另一方面，那些人固执己见，不肯让步。

sentences.en: Something gripped him in an unyielding hold.
sentences.cn: 有什么东西死死地把他缠住不放.

sentences.en: Success the team which belong to the target exactitude and unyielding.
sentences.cn: 成功只属于目标正确、坚忍不拔的团队.

sentences.en: The poor family trained his unyielding, and tenacious character.
sentences.cn: 寒苦的家境造就了他不屈不挠的品质.

sentences.en: The unyielding man fiercely pierced the shield in the field.
sentences.cn: 那个不屈的人凶猛地刺穿田野里的盾牌.

sentences.en: They ransacked brick rubble lay strong strong and unyielding ( up ).
sentences.cn: 它们掀翻了断砖碎石 ( 倔强坚强刚强 ) 地往上长.

sentences.en: This kind of knife is firm and unyielding.
We have lost fanatical pride and unyielding and principled.
sentences.cn: 我们丢失了狂热的骄傲和血性.

phrases.tran_cn: 不可压缩支架；刚性支架

trans.tran_cn: 坚硬的，不能弯曲的，不屈的，刚强，不屈服，倔强
trans.tran_en: not willing to change your ideas or beliefs
